sentences.en: One of government's primary duties is the redistribution of income, so that the better off can help the worse off out of poverty.
sentences.cn: 政府的主要职责之一就是收入的重新分配，这样富裕的人能帮助贫穷的人摆脱贫困。

sentences.en: You get a redistribution and mixing of soil as deep roots are ripped up from the ground.
sentences.cn: 当深根被从地上拔起时，你会得到土壤的重新分配和混合。

sentences.en: Using Bonferroni statistical tests, intervertebral motion redistribution of each construct was compared with the intact.
sentences.cn: 使用邦弗朗尼统计学测试，将每个构建体的椎间运动重新分布与完整状态进行比较。
